mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAME_CONTENT ( GAME_TITLE, GAME_TARGET_LEVEL, GAME_PRICE, GAME_DISCOUNT_PRICE, GAME_CONTENT, GAME_COUNT, GAME_SUB_REGDATE, GAME_SUB_ENDDATE ) VALUES ( #{game_title}, #{game_target_level}, #{game_price}, #{game_discount_price}, #{game_content}, #{game_count}, #{game_sub_startDate}, #{game_sub_endDate} )
